name: Panda Punch
description:
Panda Punch is a puzzle platformer game in which you have to control a red panda and save the world from evil alien robots.

Solve puzzles on the levels, collect coins, look for super coins, pump your abilities from the blacksmith.

Defeat bosses, get new abilities.

Features:
* 58 levels with traps, secrets, enemies
* Platform jumping and combat
* Classic pixel-art graphics and chiptune sound

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1798350/
